messaging.v2.rcs_compliance_patch_update.description: The KYC compliance information. This section consists of response to the request launch.

registration_sid.description: The default compliance registration SID (e.g., from CR-Google) that applies to all countries unless overridden within the `countries` array.

countries.description: A list of country-specific compliance details.

messaging.v2.rcs_compliance_response.description: The KYC compliance information. This section consists of response to the request launch.

registration_sid.description: The default compliance registration SID (e.g., from CR-Google) that applies to all countries unless overridden in the `countries` array.

countries.description: A list of country-specific compliance details.

The default compliance registration SID (e.g., from CR-Google) that applies to all countries unless overridden in the `countries` array.

name.description: The name of the carrier. For example, `Verizon` or `AT&T` for US.

messaging.v2.rcs_country_status.description: The country-level status. Based on the aggregation of the carrier-level status.

waba_id.description: The ID of the WhatsApp Business Account (WABA) to use for this sender.

voice_application_sid.description: The SID of the Twilio Voice application.

messaging.v2.channels_sender.configurati.description: The configuration settings for creating a sender.

callback_url.description: The URL to send the webhook to.

callback_method.description: The HTTP method for the webhook.

fallback_url.description: The URL to send the fallback webhook to.

fallback_method.description: The HTTP method for the fallback webhook.

status_callback_url.description: The URL to send the status callback to.

status_callback_method.description: The HTTP method for the status callback.

messageId.description: Message SID that identifies the conversation thread for the typing indicator. Must be a valid Twilio Message SID (SM*) or Media SID (MM*) from an existing WhatsApp conversation.

messaging.v2.channels_sender.profile.description: The profile information for the sender.

name.description: The name of the sender. Required for WhatsApp senders and must follow [Meta's display name guidelines](https://www.facebook.com/business/help/757569725593362).

about.description: The profile about text for the sender.

logo_url.description: The logo URL of the sender.

banner_url.description: The banner URL of the sender.

privacy_url.description: The privacy URL of the sender. Must be a publicly accessible HTTP or HTTPS URI associated with the sender.

terms_of_service_url.description: The terms of service URL of the sender.

accent_color.description: The color theme of the sender. Must be in hex format and have at least a 4:5:1 contrast ratio against white.

vertical.description:
The vertical of the sender. Allowed values are:
- `Automotive`
- `Beauty, Spa and Salon`
- `Clothing and Apparel`
- `Education`
- `Entertainment`
- `Event Planning and Service`
- `Finance and Banking`
- `Food and Grocery`
- `Public Service`
- `Hotel and Lodging`
- `Medical and Health`
- `Non-profit`
- `Professional Services`
- `Shopping and Retail`
- `Travel and Transportation`
- `Restaurant`
- `Other`

phone_numbers.description: The phone numbers of the sender.

info.title: Twilio - Messaging
info.description: This is the public Twilio REST API.

/v2/Indicators/Typing.json.description: Send a typing indicator event between OTT senders (e.g., WhatsApp, RCS).

post.description: Send a typing indicator to notify the recipient that you are composing a message. Currently supported for whatsapp channel only. For WhatsApp, `messageId` is required.

whatsapp_typing_indicator.description: Send a typing indicator for an active WhatsApp conversation

200.description: Typing indicator was successfully sent to the recipient.

success.description: Indicates if the typing indicator was sent successfully.

Access-Control-Allow-Origin.description: Specify the origin(s) allowed to access the resource

Access-Control-Allow-Methods.description: Specify the HTTP methods allowed when accessing the resource

Access-Control-Allow-Headers.description: Specify the headers allowed when accessing the resource

Access-Control-Allow-Credentials.description: Indicates whether the browser should include credentials

/v2/Channels/Senders.description: The Senders resource represents a messaging channel sender (WhatsApp, RCS).

Access-Control-Allow-Origin.description: Specify the origin(s) allowed to access the resource

Access-Control-Allow-Methods.description: Specify the HTTP methods allowed when accessing the resource

Access-Control-Allow-Headers.description: Specify the headers allowed when accessing the resource

Access-Control-Allow-Credentials.description: Indicates whether the browser should include credentials

get.description: Retrieve a list of Senders for an account.

schema.description: The messaging channel for senders. Supported values are `whatsapp` and `rcs`.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of items to return per page.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The page index. Use only for client state.

parameters.name: PageToken
parameters.description: The page token provided by the API.

Access-Control-Allow-Origin.description: Specify the origin(s) allowed to access the resource

Access-Control-Allow-Methods.description: Specify the HTTP methods allowed when accessing the resource

Access-Control-Allow-Headers.description: Specify the headers allowed when accessing the resource

Access-Control-Allow-Credentials.description: Indicates whether the browser should include credentials

/v2/Channels/Senders/{Sid}.description: The Senders resource represents a messaging channel sender.

Access-Control-Allow-Origin.description: Specify the origin(s) allowed to access the resource

Access-Control-Allow-Methods.description: Specify the HTTP methods allowed when accessing the resource

Access-Control-Allow-Headers.description: Specify the headers allowed when accessing the resource

Access-Control-Allow-Credentials.description: Indicates whether the browser should include credentials

post.description: (WhatsApp only) Update a Sender. You can update a sender's information, including `profile`, `webhook`, and `configuration`. To verify a phone number, set `configuration.verification_code` to the One-time Password (OTP) that you received.
post.summary: Update a sender's information, including `profile`, `webhook`, and `configuration`.
